alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson; Mellette; Todd (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 12:38AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Todd, southwestern Mellette, southern Jackson and northeastern Bennett Counties through 115 AM MDT/215 AM CDT/... At 1238 AM MDT/138 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Upper Cut Meat, or 27 miles east of Martin, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Parmelee, Upper Cut Meat and He Dog around 150 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Grass Mountain, Rosebud, Soldier Creek, Ring Thunder, Two Strike and Fairgrounds Housing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM MDT/800 AM CDT/ for south central and southwestern South Dakota.
